snippet: Investors’ anxieties about the so-called fiscal cliff led to light trading and almost unchanged closing values; worries about the future affected foreign markets as well.
abstract: Stocks close nearly unchanged, after day of uneven trading plagued by investors' fears about approaching spending cuts and tax increases.
lead_paragraph: Investors’ anxieties about the so-called fiscal cliff led to light trading and almost unchanged closing values; worries about the future affected foreign markets as well.

headline.main: U.S. Markets Fidget, Fret and Go Nowhere
headline.print_headline: U.S. Markets Fidget, Fret and Go Nowhere
